content: this is a legal case about the division of property between two parties the court made a decision on december 21 2020 but the summary does not provide details about the parties or the outcome of the case the court divided both immovable and movable property including apartments land buildings vehicles a ring and weapons the applicant requested a portion of various items and the court awarded them a share of each item the court also ordered the defendants to pay compensation for their share of the applicants property the parties disagreed on the value of some items but the court made decisions based on expert reports and evidence the court upheld the applicants claims and ordered the defendants to pay compensation and costs the court has the authority to deviate from usual cost rules the court partially granted the claim for property division and also granted a counterclaim for burial costs to a limited extent the courts decision was to divide the common property and award specific items to each party with corresponding compensation
